title: Frequently Asked Questions - Year 3
itunes:title: Frequently Asked Questions - Year 3
description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! - Join our PATREON family for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

- Show credits

 

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: - Get your TBR merch and podcast transcripts - Get a copy of TBR Book 

- YouTube: The Bible Recap Playlist

- The Bible Recap Show Notes - Sign up to get our monthly email newsletter

 

PATREON: - Join our PATREON family for bonus perks & The Bible Kneecap!

- The Bible Kneecap: FREE PREVIEW - The Bible Kneecap Access List: Apps Capable of Private URL Links - How to update your Patreon account

FAQs:

- FAQ Highlight Reel on Instagram 

- FAQ page of our website

- Questions page of our website

- Contact page of our website

QUESTION READERS: Allison Congden Courtney Vaughan

Jacqueline Terrel

Callie Summers Joelle Smith Sarah Yocum SOCIALS:

The Bible Recap: Instagram | Facebook | Twitter

D-Group: Instagram | Facebook | Twitter

TLC: Instagram | Facebook | Twitter

 

D-GROUP: The Bible Recap is brought to you by D-Group - an international network of discipleship and accountability groups that meet weekly in homes and churches: Find or start one near you today!
